alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida; Portage; Vilas; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 22 at 9:31PM CST until January 23 at 10:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...COLD TEMPERATURES AND WIND WILL RESULT IN HAZARDOUS CONDITIONS LATE TONIGHT INTO SUNDAY MORNING... .Cold air flowing into the area on west winds will result in hazardous conditions for anyone outdoors without appropriate winter clothing late tonight into Sunday morning. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 10 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Wisconsin. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 10 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The combination of wind and cold will result in hazardous conditions for anyone outdoors without appropriate winter clothing. Exposed skin can suffer frostbite in as little as 30 minutes in these conditions.
info.instruction: Wear appropriate clothing if you are going to be outdoors late tonight or Sunday morning, including a hat, and gloves or mittens.

area.areaDesc: Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida; Portage; Vilas; Wood
